mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.company_name, c.company_info, c.company_url, COUNT(f.id) AS follow_count FROM tbl_company c LEFT JOIN tbl_follow f ON c.user_id = f.company_id WHERE f.follow_status = 'active' GROUP BY c.user_id, c.company_name, c.company_info, c.company_url ORDER BY follow_count DESC LIMIT 6;
select count(*) from tbl_follow where company_id = #{companyId} and follow_status = 'active'
select count(*) from tbl_follow where member_id = #{memberId} and follow_status = 'active'
